001package game;
002
003import javax.swing.*;
004import java.awt.*;
005import java.awt.event.*;
006import java.net.URL;
007//import java.awt.image.*;
008
009/**
010 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a 
011 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
012 * 
013 * @author Michael Kolling
014 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023) Christophe TARATIBU modified (2025)
015 */
016public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
017{
018    private GameEngine aEngine;
019    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
020    private JTextField aEntryField;
021    private JTextArea  aLog;
022    private JLabel     aImage;
023    private JButton   aQuitButton;
024    private JButton aGoWestButton;
025    private JButton aGoNorthButton;
026    private JButton aGoSouthButton;
027    private JButton aGoEastButton;
028    private JButton aLookButton;
029    private JButton aEatButton;
030    private JButton aBackButton;
031    private JButton aTakeButton;
032    private JButton aDropButton;
033
034    /**
035     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
036     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
037     * needed.
038     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
039     */
040    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
041    {
042        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
043        this.createGUI();
044    } // UserInterface(.)
045
046    /**
047     * Print out some text into the text area.
048     * @param pText Text to print
049     */
050    public void print( final String pText )
051    {
052        this.aLog.append( pText );
053        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
054    } // print(.)
055
056    /**
057     * Print out some text into the text area, with a carriage return.
058     * @param pText Text to print
059     */
060    public void println( final String pText )
061    {
062        this.print( pText + "\n" );
063    } // println(.)
064
065    /**
066     * Show an image file in the interface.
067     * @param pImageName The name of the image file.
068     */
069    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
070    {
071        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
072        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
073        if ( vImageURL == null )
074       
075            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
076        else {
077            //System.out.println("Image found : " + vImagePath );
078            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
079            Image vImage = vIcon.getImage();
080            Image vNewImage = vImage.getScaledInstance( 600, 400, Image.SCALE_SMOOTH);
081            vIcon = new ImageIcon( vNewImage );
082            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
083            //this.aImage.res
084            this.aMyFrame.pack();
085        }
086    } // showImage(.)
087
088    /**
089     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
090     * @param pOnOff true to enable, false to disable
091     */
092    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
093    {
094        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
095        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
096            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
097            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
098        }
099        else { // disable
100            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
101            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
102        }
103    } // enable(.)
104
105    /**
106     * Set up graphical user interface.
107     */
108    private void createGUI()
109    {
110        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "The return of Yamata no Orochi" ); // change the title !
111        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
112        this.aQuitButton = new JButton("Quit");
113        this.aGoNorthButton = new JButton("go north");
114        this.aGoSouthButton = new JButton("go south");
115        this.aGoEastButton = new JButton("go east");
116        this.aGoWestButton = new JButton("go west");
117        this.aLookButton = new JButton("look");
118        this.aEatButton = new JButton("eat");
119        this.aBackButton = new JButton("back");
120        this.aTakeButton = new JButton("take");
121        this.aDropButton = new JButton("drop");
122        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
123        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
124        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
125        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
126        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
127
128        this.aImage = new JLabel();
129
130        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
131        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() );
132        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
133        // Journal au centre
134        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
135
136        // Bas de fenêtre : croix directionnelle + commandes au milieu
137        JPanel vSouthPanel = new JPanel(new GridBagLayout());
138        GridBagConstraints vGbc = new GridBagConstraints();
139        vGbc.insets = new Insets(5,5,5,5);
140        // nord (en haut)
141        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 0; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
142        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoNorthButton, vGbc);
143        // ouest (à gauche)
144        vGbc.gridx = 0; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
145        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoWestButton, vGbc);
146        // est (à droite)
147        vGbc.gridx = 2; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
148        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoEastButton, vGbc);
149        // sud (en bas)
150        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 2; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
151        vSouthPanel.add(this.aGoSouthButton, vGbc);
152        // milieu : panneau avec look/eat/back
153        JPanel vMiddleCommands = new JPanel(new GridLayout(1, 5, 5, 5));
154        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aLookButton);
155        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aEatButton);
156        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aBackButton);
157        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aTakeButton);
158        vMiddleCommands.add(this.aDropButton);
159        vGbc.gridx = 1; vGbc.gridy = 1; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.NONE;
160        vSouthPanel.add(vMiddleCommands, vGbc);
161        // bouton Quit à droite du bas
162        vGbc.gridx = 3; vGbc.gridy = 2; vGbc.fill = GridBagConstraints.HORIZONTAL;
163        vSouthPanel.add(this.aQuitButton, vGbc);
164        vPanel.add(vSouthPanel, BorderLayout.SOUTH);
165        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
166        //this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( this.aQuitButton, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
167
168        // add some event listeners to some components
169        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
170        this.aQuitButton.addActionListener(this);
171        this.aGoNorthButton.addActionListener(this);
172        this.aGoSouthButton.addActionListener(this);
173        this.aGoEastButton.addActionListener(this);
174        this.aGoWestButton.addActionListener(this);
175        this.aLookButton.addActionListener(this);
176        this.aEatButton.addActionListener(this);
177        this.aBackButton.addActionListener(this);
178        this.aTakeButton.addActionListener(this);
179        this.aDropButton.addActionListener(this);
180
181        // to end program when window is closed
182        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
183            new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
184                @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
185                {
186                    System.exit(0);
187                }
188        } );
189
190        this.aMyFrame.pack();
191        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
192        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
193    } // createGUI()
194
195    /**
196     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
197     */
198    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE ) 
199    {
200        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
201        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
202        if(pE.getSource() == this.aQuitButton){
203            //this.aEngine.endGame();
204            this.processCommand("quit");
205            Timer vTimer = new Timer(1000, ev -> System.exit(0));
206            vTimer.setRepeats(false);
207            vTimer.start();
208        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoNorthButton){
209            this.processCommand("go north");
210        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoSouthButton){
211            this.processCommand("go south");
212        }  else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoWestButton){
213            this.processCommand("go west");
214        }  else if(pE.getSource() == this.aGoEastButton){
215            this.processCommand("go east");
216        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aLookButton){
217            this.processCommand("look");
218        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aEatButton){
219            this.processCommand("eat");
220        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aBackButton){
221            this.processCommand("back");
222        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aTakeButton){
223            // Open dialog to choose an item present in the room
224            String[] vOptions = this.aEngine.getCurrentRoomItemNames();
225            if (vOptions == null || vOptions.length == 0){
226                this.println("There are no items to take here.");
227            } else {
228                String vChoice = (String) JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
229                    this.aMyFrame,
230                    "Choose an item to take:",
231                    "Take",
232                    JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
233                    null,
234                    vOptions,
235                    vOptions[0]
236                );
237                if (vChoice != null && !vChoice.isEmpty()){
238                    this.processCommand("take " + vChoice);
239                }
240            }
241        } else if(pE.getSource() == this.aDropButton){
242            // Open dialog to choose an item from inventory to drop
243            String[] vOptions = this.aEngine.getPlayerItemNames();
244            if (vOptions == null || vOptions.length == 0){
245                this.println("You have no items to drop.");
246            } else {
247                String vChoice = (String) JOptionPane.showInputDialog(
248                    this.aMyFrame,
249                    "Choose an item to drop:",
250                    "Drop",
251                    JOptionPane.QUESTION_MESSAGE,
252                    null,
253                    vOptions,
254                    vOptions[0]
255                );
256                if (vChoice != null && !vChoice.isEmpty()){
257                    this.processCommand("drop " +vChoice);
258                }
259            }
260        } else {
261            this.processCommand(null);
262        }
263         // never suppress this line
264    } // actionPerformed(.)
265
266    /**
267     * A command has been entered in the entry field.  
268     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
269     * @param pInput The input command string.
270     */
271    public void processCommand(final String pInput)
272    {
273        if(pInput == null){
274            String vInputKb = this.aEntryField.getText();
275            this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
276            this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInputKb );
277        } else {
278            this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
279            this.aEngine.interpretCommand(pInput);
280        }
281        
282    } // processCommand()
283} // UserInterface 
284
